mapper.insert: insert into comBoard(commNo, userId, commSub, commText, commCount, commFile, commDate, commUpdate, commDelYn, likeCnt) values(com_no_seq.nextval,#{userId},#{commSub},#{commText},0,#{commFile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,sysdate,'N', 0)

select.if:
select * from (select community.*,rowNum rn from ( select * from comBoard
${search} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
commSub like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or commText like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and commDelYn = 'N'
order by commNo desc ) community ) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select * from (select community.*,rowNum rn from ( select * from comBoard
${search} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
commSub like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or commText like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and commDelYn = 'N'
order by commCount desc, commNo desc) community ) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select * from (select community.*,rowNum rn from ( select * from comBoard
${search} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
commSub like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or commText like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and commDelYn = 'N'
order by likeCnt desc, commNo desc) community ) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

mapper.select:
select count(*) from comBoard
${search} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
commSub like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or commText like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
and commDelYn = 'N'
mapper.update: update comBoard set commCount=commCount+1 where commNo=#{commNo}
update comBoard set commDelYn='Y' where commNo=#{commNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from comLike where commNo=#{commNo} and commLike = 'Y'
mapper.update:
update comBoard set
likeCnt = likeCnt-1
likeCnt = likeCnt+1
where commNo=#{commNo}
